login.one_time_code_login: Sign in with a single-use code

verification_code.verification_code_subtitle: A text message with a four- digit verification code has been sent to your phone number
verification_code.enter_code_to_proceed: A text message with a 4 digit verification code has been sent to your phone number
verification_code.code_is_wrong: The code is incorrect, please try again
verification_code.instractions: The message “Click here to resend“ will appear Instead of “the code is on the way“ after the 30 are over seconds.
verification_code.note: The message “Click here to resend“ will appear instead of “the code is on the way“ after the 30 are over seconds.

weight_selector.recommendation: מומלץ להעלות תמונה עדכנית בה נראה כל הגוף כדי לעקוב אחר השינוי
weight_selector.press_here_to_upload: Tap here to upload your photo at the beginning of the process
weight_selector.do_not_worry_message: אין מה לדאוג, לעולם לא נעשה שימוש בתמנות שלך

date_picker.what_is_your_birthday: What is your date of birth?

choose_password_screen.English_letters_upper_lower_case: include upper and lower case letters
choose_password_screen.passwords_do_not_match: The passwords do not match, please try again

goals_in_registration.what_you_want_to_achieve: What do you want to achieve with the test?
goals_in_registration.must_choose_one: You must choose at least one answer
goals_in_registration.error_message: You cannot choose to lose weight and gain weight at the same time, please choose one of them.

complete_information_sub_step.title: Completion of details
complete_information_sub_step.image_desc1: It is recommended to upload a recent photo showing the whole body to track the change
complete_information_sub_step.image_desc2: Don't worry, your photos will never be used
complete_information_sub_step.note: You must sign a consent form for genetic testing and confirm the terms of use, privacy policy, transaction cancellation.

package_on_way_to_you.title: The test is on the way
package_on_way_to_you.desc: Return here once the package arrives to continue with the process

tube_scan.title: Scan the barcode
tube_scan.description: Congratulations, you have received the test kit! Continue by scanning the barcode found on the test tube.

tube_scan_premision.title: Allow to access your camera
tube_scan_premision.description: In order to be able to scan the brocade of the test tube, you must authorize the application to access the camera on your device.

tube_manually_input.title: Manual test tube number entry
tube_manually_input.barcode_doesnt_match: The barcodes entered do not match, please try again

error_scanning_tube.title: Error scanning
error_scanning_tube.description: There was an error scanning the barcode, enter the number manually or contact customer service.

performing_the_test.title: Performing the test
performing_the_test.description: Watch this video in full to continue. Important! Fast one hour before performing the test!

delivery_on_way_to_you.title: The courier is on his way to you to collect the sample
delivery_on_way_to_you.description: In the next few minutes you will receive an SMS message to coordinate a time to collect the assessment. If you are the customer outside of Israel, please update the customer service to summon the collection of the kit from your home.

address_for_pickup.title: Coordinating the test collection
address_for_pickup.description: After performing the test, you must coordinate the courier for test tube pickup and delivery to the laboratory.
address_for_pickup.form_title: Added a new address for collection
